addr: 33 Old Broad Street London, England EC2N 1HZ GB
title: Merlin Lecture with Brand Learning
desc: Brand Learning's Brand Directors Hayley Spurling and Sarah Jones will be hosting a Merlin Lecture which will be a rich discussion along with?adding new stimulus and a chance for you to add your own perspective... How to be a growth driver When did you last ask yourself, what you can do better to drive growth in your organisation? This session will not only inspire the question, but will also help you answer it. Brand Learning reveals the findings of Growth Drivers, a global study in partnership with The Marketing Academy. We uncovered what high-growth organisations and leaders do in practice that makes them stand out from the rest. In this lecture we will reveal what companies must change in how they operate. We will explore what it means to constantly tune themselves to respond to customer desires, release the energy of involved employees and fuel growth with momentum-driving practices. We will also share practical implications for you and your organization to help you get growth-ready. Please note that on booking your ticket you will receive an email confirmation, this will contain the full venue address. Please ensure that your email provider doesn?t junk or spam emails from eventbrite. Our merlin lectures are sponsored by:
